description: This file defines multiple Flutter screens related to a cinematic TV interface, including details, search, watchlist, and settings screens. It contains UI widgets, state management, focus handling for D-pad navigation, and navigation logic.

classes.name: DetailsScreen
classes.description: Displays detailed information about a selected item with focusable buttons for actions like Play and Add to Watchlist.

classes.name: _DetailsButtons
classes.description: Contains focusable buttons for Play and Add to Watchlist actions.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: Provides a focusable search bar and list for recent searches or search results with navigation to details.

classes.name: _SearchFieldStub
classes.description: A focusable, styled search input placeholder with focus and hover effects.

classes.name: WatchlistScreen
classes.description: Displays a list of watchlisted items with focusable remove buttons.

classes.name: _WatchlistRow
classes.description: Represents a single watchlist item with a focusable remove button.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A focusable list of settings options with visual focus and activation effects.

classes.name: _SettingsTile
classes.description: Individual settings option with focus, hover, and activation styling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each screen.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of focus nodes for focus management.

methods.name: onActivate
methods.description: Callback invoked when a focusable element is activated, e.g., via D-pad or click.

methods.name: _runSearch
methods.description: Performs search using AppState and updates search results.

methods.name: toggleWatchlist
methods.description: Adds or removes an item ID from the watchlist.

methods.name: go
methods.description: Navigates to a different route in the app via AppNavigator.
